description:
Everything you know and love about the Bridger Jean but in a more modern, slim, tapered silhouette. It's an elevated take on the bestselling original. And if you need a reminder of why the Bridger is universally popular, let's start with its performance stretch denim design, because this fabric is made to move.

That means you can wear it from the office to the open road and never miss a beat. The organic cotton makes it a super comfortable and sustainable pick, and this new cut gives you an edge when it comes to looking fresh.
name: Prana Bridger Slim Tapered Jeans, 32" Inseam - Mens
